verses.verse: <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9598>song<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H1342>highly<s%> <S%H1342>exalted;<s%> The <S%H5483>horse<s%> and its <S%H7392>rider<s%> He has <S%H9556>hurled<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

"The <S%H3050>Lord<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2172>song,<s%> And He has <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I will <S%H9316>praise<s%> Him; My father's <S%H430>God,<s%> and I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> Him.
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H4421>warrior;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is His <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"Pharaoh's <S%H4818>chariots<s%> and his <S%H2428>army<s%> He has <S%H3384>cast<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> And the <S%H4005>choicest<s%> of his <S%H7991>officers<s%> are <S%H2883>drowned<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>
"The <S%H8415>deeps<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> them; They <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H68>stone.<s%>

"Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> is <S%H142>majestic<s%> in <S%H3581>power,<s%> Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7492>shatters<s%> the <S%H340>enemy.<s%>

"And in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of Thine <S%H1347>excellence<s%> Thou dost <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against Thee; Thou dost <S%H7971>send<s%> forth Thy <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H2740>anger,<s%> [and] it <S%H398>consumes<s%> them as <S%H7179>chaff.<s%>

"And at the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of Thy <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H6192>piled<s%> up, The <S%H5140>flowing<s%> <S%H5140>waters<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> up <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5067>heap;<s%> The <S%H8415>deeps<s%> were <S%H7087>congealed<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

"The <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I will <S%H7291>pursue,<s%> I will <S%H5381>overtake,<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil;<s%> My <S%H5315>desire<s%> shall be <S%H4390>gratified<s%> against them; I will <S%H9553>draw<s%> out my <S%H2719>sword,<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H3423>destroy<s%> them.'
"Thou didst <S%H5398>blow<s%> with Thy <S%H7307>wind,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> them; They <S%H6749>sank<s%> like <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee among the <S%H410>gods,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee, <S%H142>majestic<s%> in <S%H6944>holiness,<s%> <S%H3372>Awesome<s%> in <S%H8416>praises,<s%> <S%H6213>working<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%>?
"Thou didst <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them.

"In Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> Thou hast <S%H5148>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2098>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed;<s%> In Thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> Thou hast <S%H5095>guided<s%> [them] to Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
"The <S%H5971>peoples<s%> have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> they <S%H7264>tremble;<s%> <S%H2427>Anguish<s%> has <S%H270>gripped<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6429>Philistia.<s%>

<S%H227>"Then<s%> the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> were <S%H926>dismayed;<s%> The <S%H9012>leaders<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H7461>trembling<s%> <S%H270>grips<s%> them; <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> have <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H4127>away.<s%>

<S%H367>"Terror<s%> and <S%H6343>dread<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon them; By the <S%H1419>greatness<s%> of Thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> they are <S%H1826>motionless<s%> as <S%H68>stone;<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2098>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H7069>purchased.<s%>

"Thou wilt <S%H935>bring<s%> them and <S%H5193>plant<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of Thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> The <S%H4349>place,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> which Thou hast <S%H6466>made<s%> for Thy <S%H3427>dwelling,<s%> The <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> which Thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H3559>established.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>"

For the <S%H5483>horses<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on them; but the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>land<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> Aaron's <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H310>after<s%> her with <S%H8596>timbrels<s%> and with <S%H4246>dancing.<s%>

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, <S%H7891>"Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H1342>highly<s%> <S%H1342>exalted;<s%> The <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> He has <S%H9556>hurled<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5265>led<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H7793>Shur;<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> for they were <S%H4751>bitter;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it was <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H4785>Marah.<s%>
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H9235>grumbled<s%> at <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> shall we <S%H8354>drink<s%>?"

Then he <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3384>showed<s%> him a <S%H6086>tree;<s%> and he <S%H7993>threw<s%> [it] into the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H4985>became<s%> <S%H4985>sweet.<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> He <S%H7760>made<s%> for them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and <S%H4941>regulation,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> He <S%H5254>tested<s%> them.

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you will <S%H8085>give<s%> <S%H8085>earnest<s%> <S%H8085>heed<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> what is <S%H3477>right<s%> in His <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and <S%H238>give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to His <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> I will <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3605>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the <S%H9258>diseases<s%> on you <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> on the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> for I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> am your <S%H7495>healer.<s%>"

Then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H362>Elim<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> there [were] <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H9407>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8558>date<s%> <S%H8558>palms,<s%> and they <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
